Message:
I was born into a family of—
what many would call—samurai.

’Twas one renowned for
its swordsmanship—
rumored to teach children
how to swing a weapon
before they’re even
able to stand.

Of course, ’twas not
too far from the truth.

My two older brothers and I
were taught proper gripping
techniques as soon as
we were able to speak.

“In this house,
one’s worth lies in
the strength of their blade.”

he and my brothers
glanced in my direction.

From the moment I was born,
no one anticipated that I’d be
able to accomplish anything.
